abstract: JPMorgan Chase has told federal regulators it may seek to recoup the money it used to buy the banking assets of Washington Mutual Inc, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the situation.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase has told federal regulators it may seek to recoup the money it used to buy the banking assets of Washington Mutual Inc, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the situation.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase has told federal regulators it may seek to recoup the money it used to buy the banking assets of Washington Mutual Inc, The Wall Street Journal reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the situation.

headline.main: JPMorgan May Pursue F.D.I.C. Funds for WaMu Claims
